title: Question:
author: Falconer
content: Today the Copa Del Rey final will be held at Estadio La Cartuja Sevilla between Real Madrid vs Osasuna. Real Madrid, in terms of quality and squad depth, is clearly the favorite to win this final compared to Osasuna, but I have never felt that Osasuna should be underestimated. Osasuna will be pushing for the title even if they are not the favorites to win it, so if Real Madrid do not want to lose the title then they will have to be pretty good at avoiding mistakes.I expect Real Madrid to win the Copa Del Rey title today, and then I would like to invite you to predict and discuss this final including odds and everything for 24 hours from now. Don't forget, choose a team that will win it because I have prepared a poll for you.

comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: Quote from: Falconer on May 06, 2023, 11:35:35 AMToday the Copa Del Rey final will be held at Estadio La Cartuja Sevilla between Real Madrid vs Osasuna. Real Madrid, in terms of quality and squad depth, is clearly the favorite to win this final compared to Osasuna, but I have never felt that Osasuna should be underestimated. Osasuna will be pushing for the title even if they are not the favorites to win it, so if Real Madrid do not want to lose the title then they will have to be pretty good at avoiding mistakes.I expect Real Madrid to win the Copa Del Rey title today, and then I would like to invite you to predict and discuss this final including odds and everything for 24 hours from now. Don't forget, choose a team that will win it because I have prepared a poll for you.According to the latest news, Real will play with the strongest team because Modric, who was injured, will also play.This may be Real's last chance to win a trophy this season, because in the Spanish championship they no longer have a chance to overtake Barcelona in the standings, and in the Champions League they are not favorites against Manchester City.Osasuna is currently in the middle of the Spanish championship, it is tenth in the ranking and is a very unpleasant and dangerous team, which it showed in the Spanish Cup.However, Real is the favorite in this match and I give them an 80% chance to win.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: I just gave Real Madrid a straight winning ticket in the copa Del Rey finals since they are the favourites in this game, even though Real Madrid's performance is nothing near satisfatering it's important to take note of their capacity judging from previous performance compared to Osasuna and from all indication, Madrid will have a slide winning in this match. This will serve Real Madrid as compensation since they are not holding any thing tangible out of the various leagues this seas in, Barcelona and man city is big threats to Real Madrid this season.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: So far we have 3 voters, and all of those voters voted for Real Madrid who will win this final (including me). Real Madrid has better squad depth than Osasuna, individual performance is the same as that, besides that, from the last 5 results of the two teams' meetings, Osasuna has never even won against Real Madrid.For real, did anyone think Osasuna would win this final? I think it's just people who don't know about football.

comments.author: bangjoe
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on May 06, 2023, 12:30:44 PMSo far we have 3 voters, and all of those voters voted for Real Madrid who will win this final (including me). Real Madrid has better squad depth than Osasuna, individual performance is the same as that, besides that, from the last 5 results of the two teams' meetings, Osasuna has never even won against Real Madrid.For real, did anyone think Osasuna would win this final? I think it's just people who don't know about football.I will also be one who chose that Real Madrid will win the Copa del Rey, I also don't think much that Osasuna will get voters. We know Real Madrid, even though their situation is declining, still Osasuna is not a team that is equivalent to Real Madrid, some of us may have decided that the trophy will get Real Madrid as a compensation not to get champions in other league this season.But the match has not started, anything can happen in the field, even though I somewhat refused I will have a competitive match in the final but I feel confident that Madrid does have to win this trophy to maintain their names.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: bangjoe on May 06, 2023, 01:03:27 PMQuote from: MAAManda on May 06, 2023, 12:30:44 PMSo far we have 3 voters, and all of those voters voted for Real Madrid who will win this final (including me). Real Madrid has better squad depth than Osasuna, individual performance is the same as that, besides that, from the last 5 results of the two teams' meetings, Osasuna has never even won against Real Madrid.For real, did anyone think Osasuna would win this final? I think it's just people who don't know about football.I will also be one who chose that Real Madrid will win the Copa del Rey, I also don't think much that Osasuna will get voters. We know Real Madrid, even though their situation is declining, still Osasuna is not a team that is equivalent to Real Madrid, some of us may have decided that the trophy will get Real Madrid as a compensation not to get champions in other league this season.But the match has not started, anything can happen in the field, even though I somewhat refused I will have a competitive match in the final but I feel confident that Madrid does have to win this trophy to maintain their names.You're right, the game hasn't started yet and it's possible that we're all wrong about Osasuna. In my opinion, the interesting thing about the Copa Del Rey final is the handicap bet, if you want to win at least @1.8 of the total bet, Real Madrid bettors must choose -1.5 in the handicap. But, can Real Madrid win by 2 scores? It could be that the FT in this final is a draw and then the results will only be seen at ET or even the penalty shootout round.

comments.author: Mame89
comments.body: I think Real Madrid will do everything to win the Copa Del Rey Cup against Osasuna because they know that is the only thing they can win, it is clear that City are far superior and are favorites to win the Champions League.Carlo Ancelotti himself glimpsed the importance of winning this trophy because it meant that in less than two years Real Madrid had won all the existing titles. Ancelotti is most interested in winning this CDR Cup, especially Real Madrid. In thirty years, Real Madrid has only been able to play in the final round of the Copa del Rey six times. three of them Real Madrid won and the other three were runners-up. The last time Real Madrid won CDR was 2014 when Real Madrid won 2-1 over Barcelona.

comments.author: bangjoe
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on May 06, 2023, 01:19:44 PMQuote from: bangjoe on May 06, 2023, 01:03:27 PMQuote from: MAAManda on May 06, 2023, 12:30:44 PMSo far we have 3 voters, and all of those voters voted for Real Madrid who will win this final (including me). Real Madrid has better squad depth than Osasuna, individual performance is the same as that, besides that, from the last 5 results of the two teams' meetings, Osasuna has never even won against Real Madrid.For real, did anyone think Osasuna would win this final? I think it's just people who don't know about football.I will also be one who chose that Real Madrid will win the Copa del Rey, I also don't think much that Osasuna will get voters. We know Real Madrid, even though their situation is declining, still Osasuna is not a team that is equivalent to Real Madrid, some of us may have decided that the trophy will get Real Madrid as a compensation not to get champions in other league this season.But the match has not started, anything can happen in the field, even though I somewhat refused I will have a competitive match in the final but I feel confident that Madrid does have to win this trophy to maintain their names.You're right, the game hasn't started yet and it's possible that we're all wrong about Osasuna. In my opinion, the interesting thing about the Copa Del Rey final is the handicap bet, if you want to win at least @1.8 of the total bet, Real Madrid bettors must choose -1.5 in the handicap. But, can Real Madrid win by 2 scores? It could be that the FT in this final is a draw and then the results will only be seen at ET or even the penalty shootout round.Of course it is interesting, Real Madrid's bettors must accept reality with small ODDS, even though this is final but Real Madrid has the biggest choice for the game, I think it makes sense if so Real Madrid got -1.5 even smaller than that.This will be a serious match for Anceloti, surely he will reduce all the strength they have to take the trophy, 2 scores should not be a burden if the squad sent down their main players to conquer Osasuna, but Jagoba Arrasate also will not be silent, they also have The strategy in this match, the possibility of a draw is indeed very high, but the risk of betting is more tiggi if betting on Osasuna, I think betting for draw or Real Madrid is safer even with small multiplication.

comments.author: Falconer
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on May 06, 2023, 12:30:44 PMFor real, did anyone think Osasuna would win this final? I think it's just people who don't know about football.I know of course that the average person will favor Real Madrid to win the match and the Copa Del Rey title today. But we never really know what will happen in the match because Osasuna is also playing to win the same title. This is a final that should be full of prestige, but I certainly have no doubts about Real Madrid's ability and experience in any final.Osasuna will of course fight tooth and nail to win their first Copa Del Rey title this season, while Real Madrid will also do the same after there is no guarantee whatsoever to win titles in all remaining competitions. The Copa title is important, so we will definitely go for it and win it.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Quote from: Falconer on May 06, 2023, 04:23:58 PMQuote from: MAAManda on May 06, 2023, 12:30:44 PMFor real, did anyone think Osasuna would win this final? I think it's just people who don't know about football.I know of course that the average person will favor Real Madrid to win the match and the Copa Del Rey title today. But we never really know what will happen in the match because Osasuna is also playing to win the same title. This is a final that should be full of prestige, but I certainly have no doubts about Real Madrid's ability and experience in any final.Osasuna will of course fight tooth and nail to win their first Copa Del Rey title this season, while Real Madrid will also do the same after there is no guarantee whatsoever to win titles in all remaining competitions. The Copa title is important, so we will definitely go for it and win it.Seeing that Real Madrid is a team that always has a lot of superiority, they are confident that Real Madrid will definitely win this match in the final and win the Copa Del Rey trophy.In the final, anyone has the right to win, including Osasuna, who has always been ostracized because they are considered a bottom-of-the-table team, but they also look at the statistics of the players and the h2h, so it's quite clear that Real Madrid will have a big chance in tonight's final.I voted above that Real Madrid will win.

comments.author: ShowOff
comments.body: Let me vote for Osasuna to win this final so that the match will be ideal for both teams.Of course, the probability of Osasuna winning is very low compared to Real Madrid, but who knows, Osasuna also wants to play this match to win.Anything is possible, so Real Madrid fans shouldn't underestimate Osasuna so much just because they look more likely to win the title. Nobody can guarantee Real Madrid a win, I think that should be true enough in a final. I think Real Madrid will have a hard work winning this final if Osasuna plays a total defensive strategy and counterattacks. In the last few matches, Real Madrid have failed to win matches against such teams, so I hope it will be a tough game for both of them.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on May 06, 2023, 12:30:44 PM~~~For real, did anyone think Osasuna would win this final? I think it's just people who don't know about football.I know Real Madrid has a good chance of winning this game, but after reading the last part of your post, I feel compelled to vote for Osasuna, not because I expect a miracle, but because I believe they will give it their all. When you know your opponent is good and has an advantage over you, the weak team tends to perform better because they'll have to give it their all, and in the case of Real Madrid vs Osasuna, they'll try every trick in the book to come out on top. But if they don't, I hope no one uses my post as a reference to mock the hell outta me.   Few hours to go, let's see how the result will turn out to be.

comments.author: izsara
comments.body: Quote from: Falconer on May 06, 2023, 04:23:58 PMQuote from: MAAManda on May 06, 2023, 12:30:44 PMFor real, did anyone think Osasuna would win this final? I think it's just people who don't know about football.I know of course that the average person will favor Real Madrid to win the match and the Copa Del Rey title today. But we never really know what will happen in the match because Osasuna is also playing to win the same title. This is a final that should be full of prestige, but I certainly have no doubts about Real Madrid's ability and experience in any final.Osasuna will of course fight tooth and nail to win their first Copa Del Rey title this season, while Real Madrid will also do the same after there is no guarantee whatsoever to win titles in all remaining competitions. The Copa title is important, so we will definitely go for it and win it.their h2h this season after 2 games is one draw and one win for Madrid.This can also be a reference aside from the fact that the location of the strength and condition of the current players for Madrid is far superior to Osasuna.But as you said, something like this still cannot be used as a real belief because this really has to be proven.Now Osasuna will definitely try their best in the final this time, moreover, this is the only chance for them to bring the trophy, especially since this is their first final in the Copa del Rey.

comments.author: Ulven
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on May 06, 2023, 06:15:18 PMQuote from: MAAManda on May 06, 2023, 12:30:44 PM~~~For real, did anyone think Osasuna would win this final? I think it's just people who don't know about football.I know Real Madrid has a good chance of winning this game, but after reading the last part of your post, I feel compelled to vote for Osasuna, not because I expect a miracle, but because I believe they will give it their all. When you know your opponent is good and has an advantage over you, the weak team tends to perform better because they'll have to give it their all, and in the case of Real Madrid vs Osasuna, they'll try every trick in the book to come out on top. But if they don't, I hope no one uses my post as a reference to mock the hell outta me.   Few hours to go, let's see how the result will turn out to be. No, we won't make fun of you , especially since Real is now leading against Osasuna with two goals scored by Rodry and there are only 10 minutes left until the end of the match. I think the result of the match is likely to increase.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: Ulven on May 06, 2023, 09:46:44 PMQuote from: Cantsay on May 06, 2023, 06:15:18 PMQuote from: MAAManda on May 06, 2023, 12:30:44 PM~~~For real, did anyone thinks Osasuna would win this final? I think it's just people who don't know about football.I know Real Madrid has a good chance of winning this game, but after reading the last part of your post, I feel compelled to vote for Osasuna, not because I expect a miracle, but because I believe they will give it their all. When you know your opponent is good and has an advantage over you, the weak team tends to perform better because they'll have to give it their all, and in the case of Real Madrid vs Osasuna, they'll try every trick in the book to come out on top. But if they don't, I hope no one uses my post as a reference to mock the hell outta me.   Few hours to go, let's see how the result will turn out to be. No, we won't make fun of you , especially since Real is now leading against Osasuna with two goals scored by Rodry and there are only 10 minutes left until the end of the match. I think the result of the match is likely to increase.Even if someone tell me in a dream or prophesized to me that Osasuna would win Real Madrid in this match I would not believe it. Real Madrid has a very good outstanding team in the area of football. The two goals that have been scored so far so good. But Osasuna also tried from their side at least they scored one goal to reduce the disgrace. For those who supported Osasuna to win the game have loss thwir games. Because this was a clear cut game that Real Madrid world win without any other assistance.

comments.author: nurilham
comments.body: Dude, Copa Del Rey final match is over already.Real Madrid 2-1 OsasunaAs OP expected, Real Madrid won the match and they get 1 trophy for this season.Although this trophy isn't as prestigious as the La Liga trophy, I think this trophy is also an important trophy. It is not easy to win it, El Classico is the key match to win Copa Del Real trophy. Real Madrid can be the champion because they can win the crucial match in the semi-final round against Barcelona. It means Real Madrid is better than Barcelona in this competition.Congratulations for Real Madrid fans!!Since Copa Del Rey final match 2022-2023 is over, I think it is time to lock this thread.

comments.author: jakdanyel
comments.body: I think that Osasuna made a pretty nice effort there against Real Madrid despite the 2-1 loss. They also had so many goal attempts but still couldn't prevent Real Madrid from being the champions in the Copa del Rey. Rodrygo became the star of the night by scoring 2 goals. His recent performances have started to impress me a lot and he is getting more consistent compared to the old times.This was an important step forward for Real Madrid considering their situation in this season. Because finally they achieved a title which should improve their morale. You know that they have fallen behind Barcelona a lot in the La Liga and they can't go for the title there. We don't know what they can do against Manchester City in the Champions League this time either. But this title must be some help for them to focus on their Champions League matchup more.

comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: Quote from: nurilham on May 06, 2023, 10:13:11 PMDude, Copa Del Rey final match is over already.Real Madrid 2-1 OsasunaAs OP expected, Real Madrid won the match and they get 1 trophy for this season.Although this trophy isn't as prestigious as the La Liga trophy, I think this trophy is also an important trophy. It is not easy to win it, El Classico is the key match to win Copa Del Real trophy. Real Madrid can be the champion because they can win the crucial match in the semi-final round against Barcelona. It means Real Madrid is better than Barcelona in this competition.Congratulations for Real Madrid fans!!Since Copa Del Rey final match 2022-2023 is over, I think it is time to lock this thread.  Congratulations to the Real players on the new trophy!The Spanish league is very difficult with a lot of quality clubs and it is not easy to win any trophy.I think I read somewhere that this is only the second Spanish Cup that Real have won in the last 10 years, so that also shows how difficult it is to win trophies in Spain.There was a lot of talk about the Real board giving Ancelotti an ultimatum that he had to win the Spanish Cup and the Champions League if he wanted to keep his job. If that's true, he's just done half the job  The Champions League will be much more difficult to win, but Real players seem to be more suited to cup competitions than championships in recent seasons.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: The win of Copa del Rey from Real will make many fans will think that it is just a warming up before the game on Tuesday against Manchester City but as I have said several times it won't be easy at all for Real Madrid in the Champions League.They have it as their main objective while City can even do without it as they are now comfortably ahead Arsenal in Premier League and most likely are the winners of it,still though they would want really bad the Champions League and I think that should be their primary objective also like Real Madrid.Congrats to Real for winning the Copa del Rey but this was already known before even the game took place,Osasuna is far behind in quality compared to Real Madrid.

comments.author: Falconer
comments.body: I'm happy with the result we got in the Copa Del Rey final this season, and of course we deserved to win this title compared to Osasuna.The match was quite tough even though Real Madrid managed to lead this match with a score of 1-0 during the first half and 12 minutes of the second half before Lucas Torro leveled the score at 1-1. Osasuna had a great final even though they lost in the end, but it seems true that most people tend to believe that Real Madrid have no problem winning this title.I respect Osasuna who gave the best game, so I agree that it was a great final for both teams. Thibaut Courtois managed to thwart Osasuna's 4/5 chances to score, this ultimately made Real Madrid the champion in the final. About Rodrygo, he is hero for this title. Congratulations to Real Madrid and all the fans, I really feel this is a title to be proud of.Thanks for participating in the thread although I realize it doesn't interest most users. Now the poll is closed and the thread will be locked because we have found a winner.
